00011 ZposGenerator::ZposGenerator( Parameters& params_, long opacity_ )
00012   : mSize( opacity_ ), mPositions( opacity_+1 )
00013 {
00014   std::vector<double> ReturnedParamsDouble;
00015   std::vector<long> ReturnedParamsLong;
00016   std::list<std::string> ReturnedParamsString;
00017 
00018   // First, we get the parameters of the medium
00019   // This is: 1st = mu, 2nd = temperature, 3rd = gluon mass, 4th = gluon mean free path
00020   // Here, we only need the gluon mass
00021   // the zDist will need the others
00022   ReturnedParamsDouble = params_.GetParametersDouble( "@mediumParams" );
00023   _mu = ReturnedParamsDouble[0];
00024   _temp = ReturnedParamsDouble[1];
00025   double _gluonlambda = ReturnedParamsDouble[3];
00026 
00027   // The jet path length in the medium
00028   ReturnedParamsDouble = params_.GetParametersDouble( "@pathLength" );
00029   double _length = ReturnedParamsDouble[0];
00030 
00031   double _maxlen;
00032   _maxlen = _length * 5.;
00033   _loverlambda = _length / _gluonlambda;
00034 
00035   MyArray zmin(1), zmax(1), param(1);
00036 
00037   // Reference function => the function under the integral
00038   // Sample function => the function from which to sample our Monte Carlo points
00039 
00040   // For uniform reference function
00041 //  UniformFunction refFn1( 1 );
00042 //  param[0] = 0.; zmin[0] = 0.; zmax[0] = _length;
00043 //  refFn1.SetLimits( zmin, zmax); refFn1.SetParams( param );
00044 
00045   // For exponential decay reference function
00046   ExpDecayFunction refFn1( 1 );
00047   param[0] = _length / static_cast<double>(mSize+1); zmin[0] = 0.; zmax[0] = _maxlen;
00048   refFn1.SetLimits( zmin, zmax ); refFn1.SetParams( param );
00049 
00050   // For uniform sample function
00051 //  UniformFunction sampFn1( 1 );
00052 //  param[0] = 0.; 
00053 //  sampFn1.SetParams( param );
00054 
00055   // For exponential decay sample function
00056   ExpDecayFunction sampFn1( 1 );
00057   param[0] = _length / static_cast<double>(mSize+1);
00058   sampFn1.SetParams( param );
00059 
00060 
00061   refFn = refFn1;
00062   sampleFn = sampFn1;
00063 
00064   mPositions[0] = 0.;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void ZposGenerator::FindRandomPositions( MyArray& Randoms )
00068 {
00069   MyArray zmin(1), zmax(1), zIn(1), zOut(1), refOut(1), sampOut(1);
00070   //_weight = _loverlambda;
00071   _weight = 1. / _factorial( mSize );
00072   for (unsigned long i=0; i<mSize; ++i)
00073   {
00074     //zmin[0] = mPositions[i]; zmax[0] = refFn->GetXmax(0);
00075     zmin[0] = 0.; zmax[0] = refFn->GetXmax(0);
00076     sampleFn->SetLimits( zmin, zmax );
00077     zIn[0] = Randoms[i]; sampleFn->NormedIntegralInverse( zIn, zOut ); 
00078     mPositions[i+1] = mPositions[i] + zOut[0]; //mPositions[i+1] = zOut[0];
00079     refFn->function( zOut, refOut ); sampleFn->function( zOut, sampOut );
00080     _weight *= _loverlambda;
00081     _weight *= refOut[0] / sampOut[0];
00082   }
00083 
00084 }
00085 
00086 void ZposGenerator::GetTempsMu2s( MyArray& temps, MyArray& mu2s )
00087 {
00088   for (unsigned long i=0; i<mSize; ++i)
00089   {
00090     temps[i] = _temp; mu2s[i] = _mu*_mu;
00091   }
00092 }
00093 
00094 double ZposGenerator::GetDeltaZi( int i ) const
00095 {
00096   double tmp;
00097   tmp = mPositions[i] - mPositions[i-1];
00098   
00099   return tmp;
00100 }
00101 
00102 double ZposGenerator::GetZweight() const
00103 {
00104   return _weight;
00105 }
